Posts.Content: thank you the decision is not easy to stay on tamoxifen I do not like to take any form of medication I am having a huge struggle with my conscious as I feel that I have no choice you have helped to clarify my thoghts thank you
Posts.Title: Tamoxifen

Posts.Content: Hi carolgolf thank you for letting me know that you have tried other antiestrogens I now feel a little more aware of the effects of these pills that the doctors hand out witout any compassion for the side effects they cause to us females I just find it difficult with the feelings of panic I get at night with the hot flashes my heart palpitates and I feel sick is this what you are going through the tought of five years of this is scary
Posts.Title: Tamoxifen
